product_name: Life is good Crusher T-Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Life is good(R) Crusher T-shirt is made of exceptionally soft cotton with a fresh pigment-dyed color, and features original outdoor-inspired graphics. "Crushing" process yields extra loft in fabric and doubles the softness. Relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: The Life is good(R) Crusher T-shirt is made of exceptionally soft cotton with a fresh pigment-dyed color, and features original outdoor-inspired graphics.
